body: The ranger's muscles become lean and defined, and his gait more deliberate and graceful. While in this form, the ranger increases his base speed by 10 feet, and he gains a +4 bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks.
name: Form of the Cat
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Shapeshifter/Shifters Blessing/Form of the Cat
